body: So acceqted recently a member told me something about an avicus community slack and if I have it. When I asked what it was he said "stop the act I'm done with you". So does anyone know what it is or am I just being dumb?
body_tagged: So acceqted recently a member told me something about an avicus community slack and if I have it. When I asked what it was he said "stop the act I'm done with you". So does anyone know what it is or am I just being dumb?
title: Avicus community slack

replies.body: Rephrase???
replies.body_tagged: Rephrase???

replies.body: he is basically asking if the community slack exists
replies.body_tagged: he is basically asking if the community slack exists

replies.body: Ok woah. I think other people are getting a misunderstanding. Community slack is a platform such players can give feedback, talk about school, music ect.  I suggest getting it as it is very helpful. You can ask an admin to add you if you like!
replies.body_tagged: Ok woah. I think other people are getting a misunderstanding. Community slack is a platform such players can give feedback, talk about school, music ect.  I suggest getting it as it is very helpful. You can ask an admin to add you if you like!

replies.body:
https://avicus.net/forums/5edc7dcc9

there ya go
replies.body_tagged:

there ya go

replies.body: Use the thread Seth linked and the Avicus Community Slack still exists.
